patch 8.2.0900: function list test fails on MS-Windows

Solution:   Make sure the fileformat is "unix"

<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/442a85369f3eb9834dbab42add45f7c4106700f4|patch 8.2.0902: using searchcount() in 'statusline' causes an error>
patch 8.2.0902: using searchcount() in 'statusline' causes an error

Problem:    Using searchcount() in 'statusline' causes an error.
Solution:   Avoid saving/restoring the search patten recursively.
            (closes #6194)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.0902: using searchcount() in 'statusline' causes an error · vim/vim@442a853
attachments.title: patch 8.2.0902: using searchcount() in 'statusline' causes an error · vim/vim@442a853
attachments.text: Problem: Using searchcount() in 'statusline' causes an error. Solution: Avoid saving/restoring the search patten recursively. (closes #6194)

patch 8.2.0903: comparing WINVER does not work correctly

Solution:   Use arithmethic expansion. (Ozaki Kiichi, closes #6197)

Solution:   Ignore seenModifyOtherKeys for mapped characters. (closes #6200)
